# Templify

> Free browser-based tool for filling Word document templates in bulk.

## What is Templify?

Templify is a document automation tool that lets you fill Word (.docx) templates with data from a spreadsheet. It runs entirely in your browser - no signup required, no data leaves your device.

## How It Works

1. **Upload Template**: Upload a Word document (.docx) containing placeholder text
2. **Define Fields**: Highlight text in the document to create fillable fields
3. **Enter Data**: Fill in a spreadsheet with values for each field (supports CSV import)
4. **Generate Documents**: Download multiple personalized documents instantly

## Key Features

- No account or signup required
- No installation - runs instantly in your browser
- 100% private - files never leave your browser
- Bulk document generation
- CSV data import
- Visual field definition via text highlighting
- Supports .docx format (Microsoft Word)

## Use Cases

- Mail merge for letters and contracts
- Generating certificates in bulk
- Creating personalized invoices
- Filling legal document templates
- HR document automation (offer letters, NDAs)
- Event badge and name tag generation

## Comparison to Alternatives

| Feature | Templify | Microsoft Mail Merge | Documentero |
|---------|----------|---------------------|-------------|
| Free | Yes | Yes (requires Office) | Freemium |
| No Signup | Yes | N/A | No |
| Privacy | 100% local (browser storage) | Local | Cloud-based |
| Data Sharing | None - all data stays in your browser | None | Uploaded to servers |

## Technical Details

- Built with React and TypeScript
- Uses JSZip for .docx manipulation
- All processing happens client-side
- Data stored in browser localStorage

## Pricing

Free. No paid tiers. No limits.
